alert.note: Alert for Marion (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 20 at 12:11AM CDT until April 20 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHASE AND SOUTHEASTERN MARION COUNTIES... At 1210 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles east of Burns, or 13 miles southeast of Florence, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood Falls, Burns, Bazaar, Matfield Green, Saffordville and Wonsevu. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
